EmailTemplate.subject: TriTech's Perform (IMC) 2013 Fire Training Summit - Thank you for your registration!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTEDÂ <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> 2013 Fire Training Summit Thank you for your registration
An official quote from TriTech will be sent and your registration will be completed once it is returned to us with the proper signatures. Thank you!
We look forward to an educational and enjoyable training. Please contact your respective Client Account Manager for questions.
David Bell (774) 239-3722 david.bell@tritech.com <mailto:david.bell@tritech.com>
Mark Baranowski (978) 215-2270 mark.baranowski@tritech.com <mailto:mark.baranowski@tritech.com> Training Details
DOWNLOAD AGENDA <http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/Invite_Feb13-14_2013_Training.pdf>
Dates: February 13-14, 2013
Location: Nashua Fire-Rescue 177 Lake St Nashua, NH 03060 Click here for map <https://maps.google.com/maps?oe=utf-8&client=firefox-a&q=177+Lake+St+in+Nashua,+NH&ie=UTF-8&hq=&hnear=0x89e3b0cb092b9575:0x5986479a7fd5d6a,177+Lake+St,+Nashua,+NH+03060&gl=us&ei=AJPcUPvUBszU0gGgpIH4Ag&ved=0CDUQ8gEwAA>
